医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
年轻的精神健康患者面临药物相互作用的风险一项新的研究表明，接受精神科药物治疗的年轻患者接受潜在危险药物组合的频率令人担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Young-mental-health-患者-at-risk-from-drug-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Young-mental-health-病人-at-risk-from-drug-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e8b5324-c109-4c18-b59d-48a971738e9a Fri, 06 Sep 2024 00:09:17 -0400 Young mental health patients at risk from drug interactions
高渗盐水可加速感冒恢复根据即将在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的一项研究，使用高渗盐水滴鼻剂可以将儿童普通感冒的持续时间缩短两天。它们还可以减少感冒向家人的进一步传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Hypertonic-saline-speeds-recovery-from-colds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Hypertonic-saline-speeds-recovery-from-colds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3998ce75-a324-4f3d-bcc9-fe4dbec0de94 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 00:00:51 -0400 Hypertonic saline speeds recovery from colds
研究表明单克隆 B 细胞淋巴细胞增多与黑色素瘤风险升高有关大约有 8 到 1000 万 40 岁以上的美国人体内有过多的克隆白细胞或淋巴细胞，这会阻碍他们的免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-monoclonal-B-cell-lymphocytosis-to-elevated-melanoma-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Study-links-monoclonal-B-cell-lymphocytosis-to-elevated-melanoma-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a46c2b2f-effe-4750-b3e6-1617bdaf091b Thu, 05 Sep 2024 23:17:00 -0400 Study links monoclonal B-cell lymphocytosis to elevated melanoma risk
基因疗法显示罕见遗传性疾病的视力显着改善患有罕见遗传性疾病（导致儿童早期失明）的人在接受基因治疗以解决导致视力下降的基因突变后，视力提高了 100 倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Gene-therapy-shows-dramatic-vision-improvement-for-rare-inherited-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Gene-therapy-shows-dramatic-vision-improvement-for-rare-inherited-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b03fb985-211b-45ee-91b6-e1ec37574e92 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 23:13:00 -0400 Gene therapy shows dramatic vision improvement for rare inherited condition
研究人员在预测三阴性乳腺癌预后方面取得突破犹他大学 (U) 亨茨曼癌症研究所是国家癌症研究所指定的西部山区癌症中心，其科学家在预测三阴性乳腺癌 (TNBC) 的预后方面取得了重大突破，三阴性乳腺癌是一种特别具有侵袭性的乳腺癌。疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-predicting-the-prognosis-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-predicting-the-prognosis-of-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c74fe41-f63d-4393-ad9c-cfcb388d4427 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 23:11:00 -0400 Researchers make breakthrough in predicting the prognosis of triple-negative breast cancer
新的免疫细胞“图谱”可能有助于诊断和治疗患有危及生命的疾病的儿童昆士兰大学的研究人员正在开发一个全面的儿科免疫细胞“图谱”，以帮助诊断和治疗患有癌症、糖尿病和狼疮等危及生命的疾病的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-immune-cell-atlas-may-aid-in-the-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-children-with-life-throne-diseases。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/New-immune-cell-atlas-may-aid-in-the-diagnosis-and-treatment-of-children-with-life-throne-diseases。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4573ca9-ec76-4561-b615-b33f5fc1ce01 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 23:07:00 -0400 New immune cell 'atlas' may aid in the diagnosis and treatment of children with life-threatening diseases
RSV 疫苗可减少 60 岁以上成年人的疾病和住院率最新研究表明，对于 60 岁以上的成年人来说，接种呼吸道合胞病毒疫苗可能具有成本效益，可以预防疾病、住院、生活质量下降和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/RSV-vaccine-reduces-illness-and-hospitalizations-in-adults-over-60.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/RSV-vaccine-reduces-illness-and-hospitalizations-in-adults-over-60.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45b3516a-5a1d-4cad-a9dc-f9254f6795f1 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 23:02:31 -0400 RSV vaccine reduces illness and hospitalizations in adults over 60
奥本大学研究人员开发人工智能驱动的方法来靶向癌症蛋白奥本大学的研究人员与巴塞尔大学和苏黎世联邦理工学院的科学家合作，在抗击癌症方面取得了突破性进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Auburn-University-researchers-develop-AI-driven-method-to-target-cancer- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Auburn-University-researchers-develop-AI-driven-method-to-target-cancer- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798f3a5c-d6ee-4585-9f59-127903460878 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 22:55:16 -0400 Auburn University researchers develop AI-driven method to target cancer proteins
正念冥想通过独特的大脑机制减轻疼痛疼痛是一种复杂的、多方面的体验，由身体感觉以外的各种因素形成，例如一个人的心态和对疼痛的期望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Mindativity-meditation-reduces-pain-through-distinct-brain-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/Mindativity-meditation-reduces-pain-through-distinct-brain-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a162e31-8f5a-4c1f-88ee-834fc3000731 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 22:49:12 -0400 Mindfulness meditation reduces pain through distinct brain mechanisms
人工智能揭示了治疗选择有限的癌症的新药物靶点威尔康奈尔医学院的研究人员利用人工智能，根据患者肿瘤的调控网络图谱来识别药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/AI-reveals-new-drug-targets-for-cancers-with-limited-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240905/AI-reveals-new-drug-targets-for-cancers-with-limited-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7239a119-00c5-417e-8401-c35fcfc226b6 Thu, 05 Sep 2024 22:26:21 -0400 AI reveals new drug targets for cancers with limited treatment options
